input.value: analytic function, relational database models, database hierarchies

div.div: analytic function, relational database models, database hierarchies

div.span: C2H Independent, C2H W2, 6 month to hire

div.p:
Job Description
Automate weekly and monthly technology risk reporting and trends to eliminate time IRM team spends to manually produce reports.
Job Specific Responsibilities
• Automate weekly/monthly quality assessments of ITRM findings to ensure that individual risk records are complete and accurate (e.g. risk rating, management action plan owners, organization hierarchy, risk treatment, risk mitigation plans)
• This is a Critical Function to prevent the disruption of IRM analysis and trending which is incorporated into weekly and monthly governance forums, i.e., the IRGC.
Candidate Requirements
• Strong data analytics
• Understand database hierarchies
• Able to solve complex problems
• Ability to analyze a problem set and determine automated functionality
Preferred Qualifications
5 years experience in an analytic function.
Strong database skills that includes querying and working with relational database model

p.br: NO THIRD PARTIES, NO SUB-CONTRACTORS, NO CORP to CORP

div.p: Data Resource Technologies Inc. is an Information Technology Staffing Firm serving the markets of the United States of America; the greatest country in the world. We work with Direct Clients Only and do not participate in multi layer contracts. Earn The Most Possible and put over 60 years of Information Technology Industry experience to work for you today, Call or Apply NOW!!!
